descriptions.en: WINGULL has the habit of carrying prey and valuables in its beak and hiding them in all sorts of locations. This POKéMON rides the winds and flies as if it were skating across the sky.
descriptions.es: Sus largas alas aprovechan los vientos marinos para planear. Cuando descansa, las pliega.
descriptions.ca: El WINGULL té el costum de transportar preses i objectes de valor al seu bec i amagar-los en tot tipus de llocs. Aquest Pokemon cavalca els vents i vola com si patinés pel cel.
